content:
Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 54, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 27, "index": 25}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}]
thought: The crafting recipe for soul torches requires 1 coal, 1 stick and 1 soul sand. I have 1 coal in slot 33, so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 54, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 27, "index": 25}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}]
thought: I have 1 stick in slot 30, so I will move it to slot 4 in the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 30 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 54, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 27, "index": 25}]
thought: I have 1 soul sand in slot 14, so I will move it to slot 7 in the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 14 to slot 7 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 20, "index": 10}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 54, "index": 24}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 27, "index": 25}]
thought: The soul torches have been crafted, so I will move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
